entry.tran: 费劲的;苛刻的；要求严格的
entry.def: You use exacting to describe something or someone that demands hard work and a great deal of care.

example.ex: The Duke was not well enough to carry out such an exacting task...
example.tran: 公爵身体不太好，无法执行那么艰巨的任务。

example.ex: Privately they seem to have the same exacting standards.
example.tran: 私下里，他们似乎都有同样苛刻的标准。

means.word_mean: 1. having complicated nutritional requirements; especially growing only in special artificial cultures;

sentences.sentence: "certain highly specialized xerophytes are extremely exacting in their requirements"

means.word_mean: 2. severe and unremitting in making demands;

stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ing……的→adj.代理的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 积极的, 能起作用的, 现行的
stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ive……的→积极的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的
stems_affixes.word_buile: act做+ual=al……的→做了的→实际的, 真实的
exact[v.强求;精确的]+ing……的→adj.苛求的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应的, 起反作用的, 反动的, 电抗性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: react反应;反抗+ive……的→反应的,反动的
act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕

stems_affixes.value_cn: 动作, 作用, 战斗, 行动, 举动, 行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: act活动+ion动作或状态→动作,活动
act行动,活动,做+ivity特性→活动
in不+activity活跃→n.不活跃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
stems_affixes.word_buile: react反应;反抗+ion动作或状态→n.反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
react反应+or物器→n.反应堆
act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕
act行动,活动,做+ivate使→使……活动
actual实际的+ize化→实际化→实现
counter反+act行动,活动,做→反着动→力量对抗→抵消
en使+act行动,活动,做→使[法律]动→实施法律
ex出+act行动,活动,做→[要求]做出来→强求
inter相互+act行动,活动,做→相互动→相互作用
re反+act行动,活动,做→反动;反应
trans横+act行动,活动,做→横向动→互相贸易或交易

Sentence.sentence: Major supermarkets, in meeting consumer expectations, will often reject entire crops of perfectly edible fruit and vegetables at the farm because they do not meet exacting marketing standards for their physical characteristics, such as size and appearance.
In some cases the quality requirements are so exacting that even if you wanted to have a human do the job, you couldn't.

sentences.en: His work was so exacting that by the end of the day he was worn out.
sentences.cn: 他的工作十分吃力,到一天过完的时候他已经精疲力竭了。
